newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Econ buys S$5.24 mln of granite products.
newsitem.headline: Econ buys S$5.24 mln of granite products.

text.p: Investment holding company Econ International Ltd said on Monday Granite Resources Pte Ltd (GRL) will supply its subsidiary with granite products for 18 months for Singapore $5.24 million.
The agreement was entered into by its subsidiary, Econ Piling Pte Ltd (EPPL), the company said in a statement.
It said the granite will be used in concrete making for the group, which recently clinched a deal to provide civil and engineering works for a Singapore incinerator plant.
The group recently won a S$70 million subcontract for the Tuas Two incinerator plant project.

The company said the transaction will be financed by internal resources and is not expected to have any impact on its net tangible asset and earnings per share for the financial year ending March 31, 1997.
